skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon.
How to use your Alexa to control Zinguo smart device？
1.Run Zinguo app on your phone, select device which you want control by Alexa.
2.Click “⚙” icon on Upper right corner, select "Voice Assistant".
3.Click "Alexa", and set name for each lamp.
4.Link Zinguo account with Alexa.
5.Discover device on webpage or tell Alexa "Discover devices".
6.Control device as your will.
